name: Crane Wing

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Crane Style, Dodge, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +5 or monk level 5th.

sections.text: Once per round while using Crane Style, when you have at least one hand free and are either fighting defensively or using the total defense action, you can deflect one melee weapon attack that would normally hit you. You expend no action to deflect the attack, but you must be aware of it and not flat-footed. An attack so deflected deals no damage to you.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You move with the speed and finesse of an avian hunter, your sweeping blocks and graceful motions allowing you to deflect melee attacks with ease.
